title: I cant get an S with Yasuo

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
No matter how hard I try as yas. Whether my score is 45/8/2 or 30/3/8 i get an A.

I demand justice

replies.body:
Technically it is Justice.

Your scores are marked against all other Yasuo players, Yasuo is an easy champion to do well with and there are a LOT of people who play him, therefore there will be a LOT of very high scores, so those high scores become his average (not a good score, just his average score) which means that you need a ridiculously high score to get a 'good' score with Yas.

So it is in everyones best interests for Yas to be weaker and for less people to play him, that way you could get your S's without having to go 1000/1/1000 and the rest of us wouldn't have to deal with him in every single game. So if you directed your posts to riot about nerfing Yas rather than moaning about S's then you'd be more likely to get one.

buuuuuut if you want a cheat code: Just afk farm the whole game, CS counts for way more than kills. I aim for 10 CS a minute and to have 400+ by the end of the game, and i got S+ 3 times in a row with Azir with average as scores (just as long as you don't die lots) and got lvl 7 just like that, riot never said the system was fair.
